title: Does south India has better medical education as compared to north India? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, equal to north india. I am really missing my parents 😭 who live in north I am pursuing mbbs in south… I should have opted north only but destiny want this only , what I can do… If u love your parents then don't leave them other wise no option left then south is good… Edu wise good but different languages kannada in karnataka, people speak their mother tongue…difficult to understand.. U hav eto learn the language as when posting in hospital u have to communicate in kannada people know only kannada and english. No hindi …😭😐😐
